China: Huizong abdicated in favor of his son Emperor Qinzong.
Emperor Qinzong became emperor of the Song dynasty.
Spain: Urraca the Restless died in childbirth at Saldaña de Burgos. Alfonso VII the Emperor of León and Castile, her son by her first husband Raymond of Burgundy, succeeded her as king of Castile and León, though Alfonso the Battler remained in control of the former kingdom.
